-- Please, select --: To configure dispute notifications, the URL above must be inserted into your PayU account dashboard, in "Configuration >> Account configurations" on the "Dispute notification URL" field (after selecting your account). You also need to check the "Enable dispute notification" field.

Também é necessário marcar o campo "Permitir notificação de disputa".
